<< isfolder files and folders functions filesep >>

cd

Changes Nelson current directory.

Syntax

cd(dirname)
cd dirname
previous_path = cd(dirname)
cd ..
cd

Input argument

dirname

a string: directory name to move.

Output argument

previous_path

a string: previous directory.

Description

Changes the current working directory to dirname.

a = cd() without input argument returns the current working directory.

cd() without input argument displays the current working directory.

Example

previous = cd(tempdir())
cd
cd ..

See also

mkdir, pwd.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
